title: My portfolio
presentacion: Hi, my name is Juan Thove. I am a full stack development student from Colonia del Sacramento. I am passionate about learning new technologies and building projects that create real impact. I am looking for my first job opportunity to contribute my knowledge and continue growing in the IT world

proyectosLista.title: Two-Player Strategy Video Game
proyectosLista.desc: Online web game for two players. One player takes on the role of attacker with six drones, trying to overcome the opponentâ€™s defenses. The other player defends their base using cannons, missiles, and radars. The match requires strategy, coordination, and quick decision-making

proyectosLista.title: Online Store
proyectosLista.desc: Online store developed with Genexus, where users can register with loyalty cards, create shopping carts, and select products. Each product includes information about its country of origin, supplier, and seller, and can be filtered by seller, country, category, or supplier

proyectosLista.title: E-Commerce
proyectosLista.desc: Web e-commerce developed as a project at JAP, built from an initial base structure. The system allows users to browse products organized by categories, view detailed information for each item, and manage their user profile. It also includes frontend customization, full database design, and the integration of a custom API to fetch data and handle the shopping cart using GET and POST requests.

textoContacto: You can contact me via email or through my social media
